summary: Water quality parameters are outside optimal ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5. Consider adding pH adjusters to lower pH slightly.
Reduce TDS levels to below 1000 ppm. Consider diluting with fresh water or checking for excess nutrients.
Increase water temperature to around 24-28Â°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.
